column9: This file contains data regarding normalized SARS-CoV-2 viral RNA signal in wastewater. These data support public health surveillance of covid-19 by providing a rapid assessment of circulating SARS-CoV-2 in the population. Included are normalized SARS-CoV-2 viral RNA signal for the N1 and N2 gene regions. Samples are collected from daily composite samples of primary sludge in Ottawa.
column10: Robert O. Pickard Environmental Centre (ROPEC) which collects and treats wastewater from 91.6% of Ottawa’s population
